Champs de données
$dbhost = ""
Database Host - string or Array of string (round robin)
$dbuser = ""
Database User.
$dbpassword = ""
Database Password.
$dbdefault = ""
Default Database.
$error = 0
Database Error.
$slave = false
$dbssl = false
$dbsslkey = null
$dbsslcert = null
$dbsslca = null
$dbsslcapath = null
$dbsslcacipher = null
$use_timezones = false
$log_deprecation_warnings = false
$use_utf8mb4 = false
$allow_myisam = true
$allow_datetime = true
$allow_signed_keys = true
$first_connection = true
$connected = false
$execution_time = false

errno() errnoDBmysql DBmysqlerrno
errno ( )
Returns the numerical value of the error message from previous MySQL operation
Renvoie
int error number from the last MySQL function, or 0 (zero) if no error occurred.
error() errorDBmysql DBmysqlerror
error ( )
Returns the text of the error message from previous MySQL operation
Renvoie
string error text from the last MySQL function, or '' (empty string) if no error occurred.
